title: hi riot, your boards are bad
body: hi, these boards hurt your eyes and are just horrible, nice job copying reddit and all

replies.body: Hi Azamalaza <3 ilys I've missed you xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxooxoxox thank you for your true wisdom filled words. Hopefully everyone can see the light!
I like the colour but it's a bit lame navigating... Also popular bumped threads don't seem to move upwards.
you're crazy dude....you want white that blinds you instead? srsly...
